org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Interface Clusterer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConditionsListener, EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClusterer, CTPClusterer, DualThresholdCosmicClusterer, GTPClusterer, GTPOnlineClusterer, LegacyClusterer, NearestNeighborClusterer, ReconClusterer, SimpleCosmicClusterer, SimpleReconClusterer

    public interface Clusterer
extends ConditionsListener
    This is an interface for creating clusters and providing cut values to the clustering algorithms in a generic fashion.
    See Also:
    Cluster, CalorimeterHit, EventHeader, NumericalCuts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • Methods inherited from interface org.lcsim.conditions.ConditionsListener

        conditionsChanged

    • Method Detail

      • createClusters

        List<Cluster> createClusters(EventHeader event,
                             List<CalorimeterHit> hits)
        Create a list of output clusters from input hits. The clustering algorithm may modify the list of hits as it is copied from the master list in the event.
        Parameters:
        event - The current LCSim event.
        hits - The list of hits.
        Returns:
        The output clusters.

      • initialize

        void initialize()

        Perform start of job initialization on this object.

        This method would typically be used to cache cluster cut values from the NumericalCuts into instance variables for convenience and runtime performance purposes. If the cuts have certain constraints on their reasonable values for the algorithm, then this method should throw an IllegalArgumentException if the parameter value is invalid.

        The Detector object from LCSim is not available yet when this method is typically called, so the conditions system should not be used. Instead, the inherited callback method ConditionsListener.conditionsChanged(org.lcsim.conditions.ConditionsEvent) can be used to configure the class depending on the available conditions when they are available.

      • getCuts

        NumericalCuts getCuts()
        Get numerical cut settings.
        Returns:
        The numerical cut settings.

      • getClusterType

        ClusterType getClusterType()
        Get the type of Cluster created by this algorithm.
        Returns:
        The type of the Cluster.

      • getClusterTypeEncoding

        int getClusterTypeEncoding()
        Get the integer encoding of the Cluster type. This is a convenience method, and it is declared as final in the abstract implementation.
        Returns:
        The integer encoding of the Cluster type.

      • createBasicCluster

        BaseCluster createBasicCluster()
        Create a basic Cluster with the correct type for this algorithm.
        Returns:
        The basic Cluster.
